sentences.sContent: A businessman will grasp at any chance to make a profit.
sentences.sContent_eng: A businessman will grasp at any chance to make a profit.
sentences.sCn: 一个商人会抓住任何一个机会赚钱。

sentences.sContent: His parents are so rich that he can just play at being a businessman.
sentences.sContent_eng: His parents are so rich that he can just play at being a businessman.
sentences.sCn: 他父母有的是钱，以致他可以敷衍了事地作个商人。

sentences.sContent: He is a businessman ... and that is what we need right now. Someone who can create jobs for our kids.
sentences.sContent_eng: He is a businessman ... and that is what we need right now. Someone who can create jobs for our kids.
sentences.sCn: 他是个商人，也就是我们现在最需要的人，他是一个可以为我们的孩子创造就业机会的人。

trans.tranOther: a man who works in business
